alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Caribou Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 12:13PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BAND OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS NEAR PRESTON MOVING EAST THROUGH BEAR LAKE THROUGH 145 PM MDT... At 1210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 6 miles southeast of Swanlake to near Franklin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 30 mph, brief moderate rain, and occasional lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause rough boating conditions on area lakes. Locations impacted include... Preston, Montpelier, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Franklin, Saint Charles, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Dingle, Paris, Bloomington, Bern, Minnetonka Cave, Ovid, Mapleton, Fish Haven, Liberty, Pegram, Mink Creek, Whitney, Riverdale and Emmigrant Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors or on Bear Lake, consider seeking shelter on land and inside a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Caribou Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
